Data from Hydros 21 or Decagon CDT-10 sensor

Ensure your device works with this simple test.

examples/bhydros_ex.py
 1from func_timeout import func_timeout, FunctionTimedOut
 2from esdn_sensing.hydros import Hydros, SensorError
 3#//=========================================
 4def use_hydros():
 5    return Hydros().get_data()
 6#//=========================================
 7
 8#//=========================================
 9def get_data():
10    """Main driver to fetch most recent data and return in the form of a bytearray for transmitting over LoRA
11
12    Returns:
13        bytearray: bytearray containing encoded data from the logger (intended for LoRa usage)
14    """
15    sensor_data = bytearray(2)
16    
17    try:
18        # Get data from device with 30 second timeout
19        hydros_data = func_timeout(30, use_hydros)
20    except (FunctionTimedOut, SensorError) as err:
21        exception = 2
22        print(err)
23    except Exception as err:
24        exception = 3
25        print(err)
26
27    print('Exception: \t' + str(exception))
28    sensor_data[0] = (exception >> 8) & 0xff
29    sensor_data[1] = exception & 0xff
30
31    if exception == 0:
32        sensor_data.extend(hydros_data)
33
34    return sensor_data
35#//=========================================
